body.name: Retro Game Console,Classic Mini Game System Preloaded 820 Video Games and 2 Wireless Controllers,HDMI HD and AV Output,Retro Toys Gifts for Kids and Adults.
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 17 mins
features: 820 BUILT-IN GAMES: Wireless retro game Console bring you back to 1980s-1990s which collects 820 different classic games, including dozens of the most classic classic video games, action, sports, puzzle solving, fighting and racing, etc. Back to happy childhood instantly.

AV and HDMI Output Display: video game console comes with an AV to HDMI converter (HDMI converter supports 720p /1080p), according to the selection of the input port, you can have more display options. You only use the TV remote control to select the AV or HDMI signal channel, Just connect the game console to both the TV and the power supply, and then the TV can displaythe vidoe games you want, Plug and play.

Best family Activity for Kids：Classic Mini Retro Game Console gives your children the chance to experience your growth and happiness,and promote the communication and feelings with your children.Let children enjoy the same happiness and fun in their childhood as you did! The nes retro games can also practice children's logical thinking and bring them confidence in game success.

Important Notice: This is a third-party product and the game console cannot save progress.Some of the games here are in Japanese in this mini console.This is an 8-bit game console with simple controls and picture quality will not be as crisp as today's games,and frozen sometimes,But many classic games are still fun and very challenging.

Our Guarantee: We provide 30 days no reason to replace a faulty product or refund. If you have any question about our product, please feel free to contact us and let us know about the issue and we will reply in 24 hours.
body.description: Specification: ▷Wireless 820 game console ▷Color: gray ▷Output: AV and HDMI ▷Material: plastic and metal ▷Plug: American plug ▷type: Wireless ▷Product size: 8.31*5.71*3.03in ▷Game handle size: 5.1*2*1.2in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cute little thing! All the old games we played as kids! Works awesome. Don't have to keep blowing on the thing to make games play though like the olden days lol!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews for this product before I bought it for my boyfriend’s birthday. Having remembered when the original Nintendo came out we didn’t have inflated expectations. Yes the save option doesn’t exist on all games and yes you have to hit the restart button to return to the game menu BUT in spite of those 2 draw backs we find this game system a ton of fun especially at such a reasonable price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is a great game but the picture quality could be better like 4k or hd

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Only one remote works and the delay on the working remote is beyond aggravating! There is such a lag on the remote control. The 600+ games are not in alphabetical order, so good luck trying to read the small printed game guide. NOT worth the time or aggregation!! Look for a console with wired remotes and better reviews!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it it also has two player games i can play with my kid with
reviews.reviewText: Affordable and lots of fun games that all kids like thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesnt come with all the games missing punch out
reviews.reviewText: Missing alot of games paperboy punch out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We found it to be a lot of fun.
